pullRequest.title: Add logging for job status after job submit
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #2426
Checklist:

 Labels and Milestone set

commit.message: Add logging for job status after job submit

nodes.bodyText: Here, I couldn't manage how to filter jobs submitted from a different client in a proper way.
I think a date would be useful for debugging - e.g. when there is a large pause between submission and change to running state.

commit.message: Add the date to the log and hide the job status info
Add the current date info to the log
